typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingClient
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingClients
ExistingClients select(mapColumn(
		existing_id = id,
		existing_legacy_id = legacy_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingClientIds
ConditionalSplit2@LegacyClients, ExistingClientIds lookup(legacy_id == existing_legacy_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIfExisting
StagingClient split(!isNull(legacy_id),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(LegacyClients, NonLegacyClients)
LookupIfExisting sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		row_id as string,
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string,
		insert_date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingClients
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingClients
ExistingClients select(mapColumn(
		existing_id = id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ExistingClientIds
StagingClients, ExistingClientIds lookup(id == existing_id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(existing_id, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupExistingIds
LookupExistingIds alterRow(insertIf(isNull(existing_id)),
	updateIf(!isNull(existing_id))) ~> DecideMerge
DecideMerge sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		internal_id,
		legacy_id,
		name,
		logo,
		footer,
		client_type,
		sage_reference,
		manager_id,
		contract_expiry,
		store_locator,
		status,
		created_at,
		modified_at,
		org_level1_name,
		org_level2_name,
		org_level3_name,
		org_level4_name,
		entity_source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MergedClients
